entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
